channel.title: How do you mute a player on the fr33sc4p3 source?
channel.description:
hello, does anyone no how to mute a player for 48 hours, because I can't do it! does any no the command, because ::mute (playername) dont work!
Many Thanks James.
PS: I have tried a admin and a mod account, but it still don't work!
